response.answer_text: No. We are still in the Stone Age of Medical payment concepts, just one step above …if you aren’t friends of the general or don’t have a lot of gold, you die by the side of the road.
No. It’s not a matter or technology… the USA needs the political will to make changes and join most of the rest of the world on this issue.
